text: What is the benefit of accessing AWS services using the AWS SDK?

answers.text: You can outsource all of your application's logic to the AWS SDK thus minimizing the time needed to build your application.
You can give your applications a way to programmatically access AWS services and resources, using libraries built and tested by AWS.
It is more secure to access AWS using the AWS SDK rather than other ways (such as through the AWS Console).
It is cheaper to used AWS SDK to access AWS rather than using the AWS Console or through direct HTTP requests.
